title: My 2nd mod (currently a beta)
content:
I've just finished the Keen and vorticon sprite in my 2nd mod![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-birthday.gif[/img] I'll email it to LevelLord so she can help me with the levels, but I also want to know if anyone else wants to try it.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Be careful what level you enter though, the Keen sprite is too large to fit in one tile spaces, and sense the levels aren't touched yet, and Keen starts in an one tile high space in almost every original level, you could easily get stuck and have to choices left; (A) quit to the title screen (B) quit to DOS/Windows.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img] A proud member of the beta testing society
[url=http://www.garfield.com/comics/comics_todays.html]www.garfield.com/comics/comics_todays.html[/url]
Down with VGA! Up with EGA!
Email me a beta at [url=mailto:HarveySmiths3rdemail@hotmail.com] HarveySmiths3rdemail@hotmail.com[/url]! :-)

title: Re: My 2nd mod (currently a beta)
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]I'll email it to LevelLord so he can help me with the levels,[hr][/quote]
I think LevelLord is tired of being called "he" by now.

Additionally, this is a forum for things that have actually been released, rather than things in beta. Please don't post here until your mod is fully beta-tested, bigfixed and put on the web for all to download - until then, post in Unofficial Keen Games.

title: Re: My 2nd mod (currently a beta)
content:
Indeed. Hopefully someone can move this soon..
And the 'he' was obviously typo in this case, I think.[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: heh
content: We all know there is no correct pronoun with which to describe LevelLord.  The true challenge is finding a way to convey your thoughts without having to choose.  ;-)

title: Re: heh
content:
Xky: Oh KR! I just made the biggest embarassment!

KR: Really? What'd you do?

Xky: Well, I meant to say 'Would you email me Harveys mod Madame LL' but what I said was "Why don't you go jump off a cliff you graphics ripping, psycho whore!"

*leaves*

LL: Well, I think Xky doesn't like me Kr, just right now he called me a graphics ripper!

A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: heh
content:
I have decided to abandon this mod.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] It's getting nowhere fast.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] LevelLord, if we want to continue this, we might have to start all over again.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-deadkeenvort.gif[/img] Signed, Harvey Smith
A proud member of the beta testing society
"I help entertain!" -Harvey
Tough guys have no table manners![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img]

title: Re: heh
content:
Okay. I just haven't had the time for it. However, I'm not Keenrussian; maybe it will be reborn at a future date.

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord
